name: ChatOutputText
description: Type for general textoutput for the chatbot solution based on WCH. Use the node taxonomy to specify for which dialog nodes this text can be used.

elements.label: Text
elements.helpText:
This is the "default" output text which will always be used as an answer. It's normally the first text to show. 

Avoid long text for chat answers! Make sure that your text is precise and short.

elements.label: Attachments
elements.helpText: Toggle to enable or disable attachments. If set to false no attachments will be used in the answer to the customer.

elements.label: AttachmentQuery
elements.helpText:
Advanced input field to define your own WCH search query to match against one or multiple attachments. Be aware that the result list is automatically reduced to a max. of 10 elements (that's the limit for Facebook attachments),

The preferred method is to use the content reference field below.

elements.label: Attachment
elements.helpText: Reference attachments which will be shown in the selected order to the user.

elements.label: Node
elements.helpText: Use this element to reference the acutal context your answer should be used. This maps dynamically to a specific dialog state/node as defined in the conversation state.

elements.label: Customer Segment
elements.helpText: Select a customer segment were this answer fits best.

elements.label: Emotion
elements.helpText: This field can be used together with the tone analyzer to give emotion specifc answers.

elements.label: Location
elements.helpText: Give a location where this content item should be shown. Good for regional marketing campaigns.

elements.label: Max Distance from User
elements.helpText: The distance from the given location coordinates to map from the user position to the given position.
